```py
SELECT date(date) AS dateSent, count(mid) AS numMsg
FROM message
GROUP BY dateSent
ORDER BY dateSent;
```

```py
SELECT count(*) FROM message
WHERE year(date) < 1998 or year(date) > 2002;
Result: 325
```

```py
SELECT date(date) AS dateSent, count(mid) AS numMsg
FROM message
WHERE year(date) BETWEEN 1998 AND 2002
GROUP BY dateSent
ORDER BY dateSent;
```
